To hide oneself aboard a conveyance in order to obtain free transportation.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: shortening of bestow

entry.def: If you stow something somewhere, you carefully put it there until it is needed.

example.ex: I helped her stow her bags in the boot of the car...
example.tran: 我帮她将包放进汽车行李箱里。

example.ex: Alistair had carefully folded up the paper and stowed it away under the sacks.
example.tran: 阿利斯泰尔已小心翼翼地将那张报纸折起，放在厚纸袋下面。
